QuestData.Title: A Time for Courage
QuestData.Description:
I know not what awaits us across the chasm, outsider. By the Archon's grace I hope that my Paragon yet lives, but I fear the worst.
We will face this great unknown together, as we have the rest of Maldraxxus's horrors. To be kyrian is to follow the path, no matter how dire the circumstances.
Whatever happens, know that you have earned my undying respect this day.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Amarth the Harvester with Thanikos.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Disciple Apolon at the Temple of Courage.
